title: ASUSâ€™ ZenBook 14X OLED Space Edition laptop is now available to buy
content:
ASUS has officially launched the ZenBook 14X OLED Space Edition laptop, after announcing it earlier this year at CES. As the name suggests, this laptop features a space-inspired design, and it’s meant to celebrate the first time an ASUS laptop was launched into space. Possibly the most unique thing about it is the 3.5-inch display

The post ASUS’ ZenBook 14X OLED Space Edition laptop is now available to buy appeared first on xda-developers.
description: ASUS has finally made the ZenBook 14X OLED Space Edition available for sale, featuring high-end specs and a head-turning design.
